feed.title: The Other Side of the Screen

entry.title: Counting to 10 Million Stars
entry.summary:
I am working on a new project with my largest dataset yet. Roughly 10 million stellar observations. Each star is an 11x11 pixel distribution astronomers call a point spread function (PSF).

This is one of the difficult aspects of the type of scientific programming I do. The software I write is exploratory on nature so by design large sections have to be rewritten. fdf
